CatDescriptText: Mrs. Gay DeHall, 7319 Race Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1957, pg. 2 with question: "Who is your ward chairman? Does he have any power?  Does he exert it?" answer reads: "Sarah Kirk is our ward chairman and she has the power to get things done.  However, I don't know offhand whether or not she is exerting that power."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Gay DeHall wearing striped dress and short dark gloves, holding purse, standing in front of store windows advertising Schwinn Bicycles and hosiery
